about_the_game:
This is a set of materials for standing pictures of characters based on the familiar professions in fantasy RPGs.
You can use the set in any way you like that is not bound by profession.

This software includes 18 character data. Each character has 9 professions x 2 (male and female), and 16 basic expression differences.
Also includes walking graphics, side-view graphics, and enemy graphics are also included, so that you can create an epic RPG with this one!


*****

pictures: 288 items (each character x 16 expressions)
characters: 4 sheets, 18 points (each character x 1 type, with lying down expression differences)
faces: 36 sheets, 288 faces (each character x 16 expressions)
enemies: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)
sv_enemies: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)
sv_actors: 18 enemies (each character x 1 type)

*****

Each data has two sizes, large and small. Please use the size that suits your preference.
There is also a difference between having a weapon and not having a weapon, so you can use them according to the situation.
(However, there is no weapon difference for the martial artist only.)

In addition, this software includes full-size PSD data, layered by facial expression parts (eyebrows, eyes, mouth, etc.). You can freely combine the parts to create expressions other than the basic ones.
If you only want to create face graphics, the resized data is also available for your convenience.

To reduce the size of your game, all PNG data has been processed to be lightweight.

*****

Games by Yutaro Tsuyuki:
RealityMinds
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1616050/RealityMinds/

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
